components

Class MemoryUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.MemoryUnit

  • public class MemoryUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for memory related instructions, Store and Load.
    Represents the single MEM unit we have.
    Author:
    David

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MemoryUnit()
      construct a MEM unit
      initiate its reservation stations (buffers) creation

      static void execute(int stationNumber, int type)
      Doing the actual calculation (what happens once a command enters a unit from the station) and writing to CDB
      Loading/saving to memory happens in the CDB class to simulate the unit delay and save the commands completion CC.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public static void execute(int stationNumber,
                           int type)
        Doing the actual calculation (what happens once a command enters a unit from the station) and writing to CDB
        Loading/saving to memory happens in the CDB class to simulate the unit delay and save the commands completion CC.
        Parameters:
        type - LOAD or STORE?
        stationNumber - the line in the reservation station table that holds the to be executed instruction

      • acceptIntoStation

        public static boolean acceptIntoStation(Instruction inst,
                                        int thread)
        attempt to accept new command into the reservation station. If there is room we will succeed. Calls addInstruction command in ReservationStation class.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instruction we want to our station
        thread - the thread the instruction belongs to
        Returns:
        True if successful, else false

      • isBusy

        public static boolean isBusy()
        is this unit busy during this CC?
        Returns:
        true if station is working, else false

      • attemptPushToUnit

        public static void attemptPushToUnit(int type)
        search reservation stations for commands that can begin execution
        Parameters:
        type - LOAD or STORE?

      • getReservationStations

        public static ReservationStation getReservationStations(int type)

      • setReservationStations

        public static void setReservationStations(ReservationStation reservationStations,
                                          int type)

      • getExeStart

        public static int getExeStart()
        Get CC of when the unit began current job
        Returns:
        CC of when the unit began current job
